rts:Components.rts:id: RTC:Yosuke Matsusaka and Isao Hara, AIST:Speech:SEAT:2.00

rts:ConfigurationData.rts:data: Lower limit of speech recognition score to consider.

rtsExt:Properties.rtsExt:value:
SEAT(Speech Event Action Transfer) is a simple dialog manager for robotic applications. The interactive behavior of the system can be realized without complex programming.
SEAT has following features: 1. Paraphrase matching function. 2. Conversation management function based on state transition model. 3. Adapter functions (supports OpenRTM , BSD socket, etc...).
Yosuke Matsusaka and Isao Hara, AIST
Lower limit of speech recognition score to consider.
Data convert from the skenton data to joint angles for GR001
